item.title: Arc Raiders dev on art style, player feedback and the game's '10 year plan' | Developer debrief
item.description:
Arc Raiders dev on art style, player feedback and the game’s ‘10 year plan’ | Developer debrief

Arc Raiders is redefining the extraction shooter after a successful 2025 launch. We sat down with Embark Studios’ Art Director Robert Sammelin to discuss the art style of the game, how Embark implements player feedback and the studio’s long-term vision.

item.title: All Roblox Rivals codes and how to redeem them
item.description:
Roblox Rivals codes are essential for players who want to stand out in this intense shooter. These codes can grant you exclusive weapon wraps, keys, and other cosmetic items to show off your style on the battlefield.

Active Roblox Rivals Codes (December 2025)

  • COMMUNITY: Redeem for a Community Wrap
  • RIVALS2025: Redeem for a Key
  • SHOOTOUT: Redeem for a limited-time charm

How to Redeem Codes in Roblox Rivals

  1. Open Roblox Rivals.
  2. Click on the Rewards button (gift icon).
  3. Scroll down to the Codes section.
  4. Type in your code and hit Redeem.

What is Roblox Rivals?

Roblox Rivals is a fast-paced first-person shooter where players compete in various game modes, from Team Deathmatch to Capture the Flag. The game features a unique duel system where you can challenge other players to 1v1 battles.
